message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a 55-45 split in my favor. Given that inflation affects me by 10% per round, I need a bit more to account for the diminishing value. This split is fair considering this inflation factor, and we can settle now without losing more value to future rounds.
Hi Alice, I propose an equal split of 50-50. I believe this is fair for both of us and allows us to settle without further inflation affecting our gains.
